title: Compared to version 6.5.9, the duration for completing the region check down-peer in version 6.5.10 has significantly increased.
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
6.5.10


### Steps to reproduce
1. tiup br:v6.5.10 restore point ..........
2. tiup ctl:v6.5.10 pd -u http://pd-peer.xxxxx:2379 region check down-peer

### What did you expect?
Achieving the check down-peer completion within 10 minutes, as was the case with version 6.5.9

### What did happened?
check down-peer was not completed within ten minutes.
